internal.content:
--- title: Post Upgrade --- ## User Management - User management is done in MAS. Users cannot be created in Manage. - Users are created or updated in MAS from the `Users` page in the MAS admin dashboard and will be synchronized into Manage. ### User Entitlement - The cron task `MasUserAnalyzer` in Manage calculates the user entitlement (Limited, Base, Premium, or Self-Service). - The cron task `MasUserReporting` in Manage sends the entitlement change (For example, user authorization changed) in Manage to MAS. A message is displayed on the MAS admin dashboard if the entitlement is higher in Manage. - Licence information: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/maximo-manage/8.0.0?topic=management-license-type-updates ### User Password - User password can be changed from the `Users` page in the MAS admin dashboard. - Select the user. - Click on the pencil icon on the top right to edit the user. ![image](images/edituser.png)

- Click on Replace Forgetten password link. ![image](images/replacepassword.png)

- Update it manually or auto-generate. Select `Send account password in email` to receive email with generated password. Click Save. ![!image](images/updatepass.png) ### User Profile Password - Current user password can be changed from the MAS admin dasboard. - Go to `User Profile` on top right corner on the MAS admin dashboard. Click on `Manage Profile` - Go to `Change Password` page in the Manage profile. Enter your existing and new password. Click `Save`. - Profile Information: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/maximo-manage/8.0.0?topic=manage-my-profile-information ![!image](images/manageprofile.png) ![!image](images/changeprofilepassword.png) ## User License Consumption Report - User License consumption report can be generated from the MAS admin dashboard. ![image](images/userreport.png)

--- title: Post Upgrade --- ## User Management - User management is done in MAS. Users cannot be created in Manage. - Users are created or updated in MAS from the `Users` page in the MAS admin dashboard and will be synchronized into Manage. ### User Entitlement - The cron task `MasUserAnalyzer` in Manage calculates the user entitlement (Limited, Base, Premium, or Self-Service). - The cron task `MasUserReporting` in Manage sends the entitlement change (For example, user authorization changed) in Manage to MAS. A message is displayed on the MAS admin dashboard if the entitlement is higher in Manage. - Licence information: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/maximo-manage/8.0.0?topic=management-license-type-updates ### User Password - User password can be changed from the `Users` page in the MAS admin dashboard. - Select the user. - Click on the pencil icon on the top right to edit the user. ![image](images/edituser.png)

- Click on Replace Forgetten password link. ![image](images/replacepassword.png)

- Update it manually or auto-generate. Select `Send account password in email` to receive email with generated password. Click Save. ![!image](images/updatepass.png) ### User Profile Password - Current user password can be changed from the MAS admin dasboard. - Go to `User Profile` on top right corner on the MAS admin dashboard. Click on `Manage Profile` - Go to `Change Password` page in the Manage profile. Enter your existing and new password. Click `Save`. - Profile Information: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/maximo-manage/8.0.0?topic=manage-my-profile-information ![!image](images/manageprofile.png) ![!image](images/changeprofilepassword.png) ## User License Consumption Report - User License consumption report can be generated from the MAS admin dashboard. ![image](images/userreport.png)
